item.description: Happy Birthday dumbass. Every time I’ve met you, I’ve always returned home with something. Be it a joke, a smile, or the just this warm fuzzy feeling. There are times when I’ve tried to box this feeling in, but it has been hard. I’ve slowly come to the realization that I cannot “box in” everything I experience into quantifiable units. One of them is you. I could just not define, nor could I predict you and the things you did.

item.title: About
item.description: Let’s write letters to each other more often. We can keep them here :)
